channel.title: Need help with opening client
channel.description:
Well, i joined a server based on Deltascape and i'm playing it from silabs downloadable client but i want to download their client (Devinscape), i downloaded, extracted from winRar etc, but when i click "run" i get the cmd box popping up then quickly shutting and says.....
[IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/169evqt.jpg[/img]
All help is greatly appreciated!!! thanks.[br][br][size=1]

item.title: Need help with opening client
item.dc:creator: @gh0st1 gh0st1
item.description:
@gh0st1 wrote:

go there where is this run.bat press edit delete all there and add this

@echo Off echo Loading Client... java -Xmx500m -cp .;./Class; EGUI echo Client LOADED! pause

and you finish yu can run now i hope i helped u

Read full topic
